refsection.para: This command operates on objects in the database, solely through the use of subcommands. The flexibility of the edit subcommands lies in their utilization of a common style of syntax. Coordinates in model space, offsets, and objects are all accepted interchangably as reference points. A single reference point is roughly equivalent to an absolute point in model space. A pair of refence points specifies a distance or an angle, and is supplied as a set of FROM - TO arguments (a FROM argument is similar to a keypoint). Reference points may be incomplete, and specify only one or two coordinates.
